I may not have 1000 hours under my belt, but I have enough and have played long enough to know that this game has gone to absolute crap. With every new addition, this game is about catering to killers and making life miserable for survivors. And because of this, survivors start behaving like entitled as*holes because the devs opened up crappy-killer play. It turns into a vicious cycle of selfish gameplay where no one really has fun, and there are only short moments of primitive caveman-minded satisfaction when you escape or get a sacrifice, making you go "HAHH F*CK YOU."

The developers should be ashamed of themselves for the direction that this game has gone. The community has turned into overly aggressive 14 year old kids who don't know how to have a conversation in the discussion boards. When a community falls to pieces to the degree that this one has, it lets you know what type of game is being supported. I highly suggest that any mature players avoid this game for the sake of your sanity. There are many more games that can be played that won't feel like you're bathing in a cesspool of prepubescent tears falling from people who still need a nightlight.

For example: Phasmaphobia, Pacify, Among Us, Valheim.

Good luck and avoid this dumb game!

DbD has some balance issues and bugs, but It's also fun to play, both alone and with some friends. Buy it on discount, then is worth it. I personally really enjoy the game. The devs are active and adding new stuff, fixing bugs and balancing mechanics and such. So to me this is worth it, especially since it delves into my passion for horror. I really got hooked on it. Really funny. The problem comes with the dlc, beside few cosmetic ones. You can play with the base game and enjoy a lot, but if You get serious about it, well, they are some unique teachable perks that You unlock only playing a lot with a killer/survivor, and then You can teach them to other killer-survivor, to get Your perfect custom build. It's a fun game i would recommend it but, in the end, it really is up to you.

I would not recommend this game until they fix a number of issues. 

1: If the server disconnects you, you get a disconnect penalty and cannot play until the timer is up. This happens frequently. (Note: as a network admin, I test with a ping -t and no dropped packets on my end, so it is their end). Depending on how many times their servers disconnect you, the time could be 5 minutes to 6 hours. 

2: They do nothing to deter camping. Meaning, a killer will hang you on a hook and wait in the area until you die so others cannot save you. They need to implement a penalty for this sort of behavior.  They not only do not discourage unfair play, they actively encourage camping and tunneling. So if hanging on a hook and watching a killer circle you while you earn no blood points sound fun, this game is for you. 

3: The reporting system for toxic behavior does nothing. Do not bother using it. They simply use it as metadata, but no action actually comes from reporting players for using hacks or toxic behavior. Racist comments are often posted in chat, and after tracking players that an entire team has reported we see no penalties are assessed for racist or anti-LGBTQ+ statements.

4: The ranking system is off. You might be a rank 11 facing off against a rank 1. They don't even try to keep you in the same grouping (Red,Green,Purple).

It's just good fun, especially with some friends in a discord VC so you can talk with friends while playing. but even with rando's it is a very fun game. I would recommend this to any adult who could use a good multiplayer game.
 
There are some minor problems. Spirit and Pyramid head could use a little work to rebalance them. Some abilities could use that as well, but they make sense as to why they exist. And some players can be toxic, but in my experience, that is a standard case of a loud minority ruining the game for others.

[h1] Dead by Daylight, [/h1]
vom Prinzip her ein mega Spiel, mit den richtigen Leuten bzw. mit einem eigenen Squad auf die immer verlass ist macht das Spiel mega spaß. Ich könnte es Monate oder sogar Jahre ohne ende Zocken, weil es einfach nie langweilig wird. Klar ist das Ziel einer runde immer dasselbe, aber wie und ob du das Ziel erreichst liegt alleine daran wie gut oder schlecht der Killer ist. Einfach genial! :)

这个号杀鸡也玩了300多小时了 虽然不多，但是我也是真的挺喜欢这游戏的，从吓的摔鼠标到看见屠夫不慌不忙甚至想三蹲，我从没想到我会给杀鸡差评，更新一次比一次烂，每次都有新的BUG，我们的BUG没有游戏，电机烫手，钩子吸人，电机吃人，万米刀气，玩家反馈的就跟没看见一样，制作组想怎么改就怎么改，我寻思是你们做游戏给自己玩的？飘了把？这次出的偷国屠夫属实恶心到我了，我寻思这恐怖游戏给我整个男团？等待界面在这给老子眨眼？你不济做个偷国衣服的鬼也比这玩意强啊，出刀，技能处决满嘴的思密达，除了吐妈处决说巴比伦语还有哪个屠夫说话？我寻思老杨也是借设定做成了黑人，那抖音上的阴兵是不是也能做个屠夫玩玩啊？去尼玛的阴间游戏，制作组被泥头车撞死算了。

I've put 13 hours in to this game on PC, and around 300 hours on Xbox over the past 6 years and I will preface this with I really enjoyed this game...in the past. With how long this game has been out, and the lack of new players, this game has become awful. 
The community that comprises this game is right there along with League of Legends, "git gud or git out, nerd!". Survivor players "body block" killers (an in-game exploit to keep the killer from completing their objective) and killers either babysit players that are on the hook or do anything else in their means to taunt the killer player, and killer players are either too good or too overpowered with perks and add-ons that it's impossible for teams that aren't equally equipped with equally BS loadouts to stand a chance. I played this with some other new players online and have been utterly disappointed in the lack of matchmaking (there's a ranking system that clearly doesn't work, we were paired against a killer who was MUCH higher ranked than we were) that clearly doesn't work/no longer works, how one-sided every single game has been, and how it takes an average of 8 minutes to find a game that lasts only 5 minutes because we just get absolutely creamed. 
The only redeeming thing about this game is on nights where we have 5 friends willing to play it together, the custom games are always a blast and the only time I actually enjoy this game. Playing it with the general public is the biggest waste of time I've yet experienced in my life. 
If you haven't played this game yet or are a new player coming from a different platform, please do yourself a favor and avoid this game if you'll be playing online with other folks. The only possible way I could recommend this is if you have 4 other friends that can play it with you, which as an adult, is a lot to ask.
It's not worth the headache anymore.
